name: Safe & Sound
description: Safe & Sound is a non-profit organization that tries to educate individuals at-risk about child abuse. The organization also advocates for this phenomenon through policies and laws, collaborating with other agencies and organizations, teaching classes and workshops, and supporting families and communities.
